@CandiCdeBaca @suetsam Friends of Manual collecting supplies for Manual HS students. Also donating a check for $1K. Box is at Center.
@suetsam @CandiCdeBaca at community meeting at Whittier Community Center re:MS at manual HS. Next mtg on 8/26 @6 @BCAAL
Q7:will MS be a boundary school, or will we have to fight with other people to get our kids in? A:that's yet to be determined. @suetsam
Q7: will high school teachers do home visits? A: (principal Dawkins) yes. They started this summer. @suetsam @CandiCdeBaca
Q6: what if DPS doesn't approve either applicant? A: superintendent makes request of board of @DPSNewsNow to engage different process
Q5: is there clear,  non competing criteria used for the decision? A: school quality framework (not same as SPF) @suetsam @CandiCdeBaca
Q4a: what about additional resources to support the schools?  A: principal Dawkins can share the supports they've gotten at Manual HS.
Q4: I'm excited about more options,  but how is @DPSNewsNow ensuring quality? A: come to mtgs, & the DPS process helps ensure this.
Q2: what %g of students go to nbrhd schools?  A: they're pretty spread out. Principal Dawkins can talk about STEM @suetsam @DPSNewsNow
Question 1: how is the started campus working at Cole? A: we don't have that data.  Ask someone who's involved there. @suetsam @DPSNewsNow

Why a middle school in Whittier: DPS is fastest growing district in nation. AND Whittier MS is green, but overall is yellow.
Why Whittier needs a new middle school: NNE is the largest region of DPS. DPS uses guiding documents: Denver Plan 2020, SPF, SRA

Several organizations have coopted a civil rights argument for bottom up organizing to advance their own top down interests. #GYCO #AERA15
It isn't enough to argue that we simply get rid of tests. We must first determine what to assess, and then reasonably assess that. #AERA15
The danger of coalition building across interests (alliances) is that the underlying reasons for organizing may be coopted. #AERA15

RT @shelleyzion: How to reframe community organizing agenda to be both local and targeted at distant powers, they coalition building #AERA1…
@shelleyzion @bkirshner The GYCO SIG brings the voices of communities into the world of academia where they belong #AERA15
#AERA15 #GYCO In order to win education battles on the ground, you must engage at different levels: legislative/courts, nat'l/state/local.
RT @shelleyzion: #AERA15 " commodity activist"....a warning to academics that activism is/should not be about your status!
#AERA15 #GYCO Many have not stepped foot in a high quality school for poor children, so they do not know what to ask for.
#AERA15 #GYCO When we increase the visibility of parents at our schools, then the climate of the schools begin to change.
#AERA15 #GYCO We need to resist (at least critique) education agendas that are not informed by the voices of those the agendas aim to serve.
#AERA15 #GYCO organizing in a context with a history of racial (and other forms of) segregation means we cannot start simply with the "now".
